title: Shares rise as yuan use set to grow worldwide (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) Shanghai stocks yesterday rose on the first trading day after the weeklong National Day holiday as sentiment was lifted by the creation of a global payment system which will boost the globalization of
